carouselOptions.description: Props passed to the underlying Carousel component
carouselOptions.name: carouselOptions

counterFormatter.description: Custom counter format function, "1 / 3" by default
counterFormatter.name: counterFormatter

keepMounted.description: Determines whether the lightbox should be kept in the DOM when closed, false by default
keepMounted.name: keepMounted

lockScroll.description: Determines whether scroll should be locked when lightbox is opened, true by default
lockScroll.name: lockScroll

returnFocus.description: Determines whether focus should be returned to the last active element when lightbox is closed, true by default
returnFocus.name: returnFocus

trapFocus.description: Determines whether focus should be trapped within the lightbox, true by default
trapFocus.name: trapFocus

withCounter.description: Determines whether the slide counter should be displayed, true by default
withCounter.name: withCounter

withFullscreen.description: Determines whether fullscreen toggle button should be displayed, true by default
withFullscreen.name: withFullscreen

withThumbnails.description: Determines whether thumbnail images should be displayed, true by default
withThumbnails.name: withThumbnails

withZoom.description: Determines whether zoom toggle button should be displayed, true by default
withZoom.name: withZoom

withinPortal.description: Determines whether the lightbox should be rendered inside a Portal, true by default
withinPortal.name: withinPortal

thumbnail.description: Thumbnail content for this slide, shows a placeholder if omitted
thumbnail.name: thumbnail
